New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.

(Users outside China should enter the mobile phone number in the following format: +[area code][phone number], e.g.: +91 817282982)
Password must be 8-16 characters long and combine at least two of the following: digits, letters, and special symbols (e.g. 123abc@#, or 123abc, or abc@#).

"We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws and regulations. This app needs the following permissions to work normally:

Using camera (for setting your profile photo)

If you don't agree to grant such permissions, you won't be able to use some features of this app; however, its basic functionality will still be available to you. You can always restrict permissions or revoke your authorization in the Settings."

A system error occurred. Go back and try again.

For setting profile photos

Allow POCO Community to access storage first.
Allow POCO Community APP to access your Mi Account information saved in MIUI in order to make quick login.
"You didn't give POCO Community all the required permissions. Give permissions now?"
Allow POCO Community to access storage to be able to save this image.
Allow POCO Community to access your camera and storage to be able to upload images.
Allow POCO Community to access camera to be able to post images.

"You hereby agree that POCO can collect, process, and use your personal information and items including but not limited to posts, images, comments, replies in the POCO Community, and relevant data listed in POCO's Privacy Policy. By selecting Agree, you agree to POCO's Privacy Policy and Content Policy."
Revoke authorization and stop using Poco Community now?
Would you like to grant notification permission to make sure notifications can be received?

You need to verify your identity before you update the recovery email.
